OMINAS Documentation

User Guide API Demos Installation Guide Search

Directory: obj/tools/

Contents

.pro files

abcorr.pro

Performs stellar aberration and light-travel-time corrections.

cd_to_radec_twist.pro

Computes Euler angles representing the orientation of a given camera descriptor.

dsk_cat.pro

Concatenates the given disk descriptors into one descriptor encompassing the entire system.

dsk_cat_by_name.pro

Concatenates the given disk descriptors into one descriptor encompassing all of the named descriptors.

dsk_get_perp.pro

Computes vectors in the direction perpendicular to the azimuthal direction at a point on a disk.

dsk_image_bounds.pro

Determines disk coordinate ranges visible in an image described by a given camera descriptor.

dsk_projected_resolution.pro

Computes the resolution (actually scale) components at a point on a disk in a given camera.

dsk_radial_resolution.pro

Computes the radial resolution at a point on a disk in a given camera.

footprint.pro

Computes the footprint of a camera on a given body.

get_disk_ref.pro

Produces inertial unit vectors corresponding to the projection of the given body 2-axis direction into the given disk plane.

get_image_border_pts.pro

Computes points around the edge of an image.

get_image_profile.pro

Extracts a profile from a rectangular, but not necessarily axis-aligned, image region using interpolation.

get_image_profile_outline.pro

Generates an outline of an oblique rectangular image region.

get_image_vector.pro

Projects inertial vectors into an image.

get_limb_profile_outline.pro

Generates an outline of a limb sector.

get_limb_profile_outline_linear.pro

Generates an outline of a rectangular limb sector.

get_limb_profile_outline_oblique.pro

Generates an outline of an oblique limb sector.

get_object_by_name.pro

Selects from a list of descriptors based on their name.

get_primary.pro

Attempts to determine the primary planet from a list of descriptors based on their names and proximity to the observer, or extracts the observer descriptor from an object's generic descriptor.

get_ring_profile.pro

Generates a ring profile in radius or longitude.

get_ring_profile_bin.pro

Generates a ring profile in radius or longitude using binning.

get_ring_profile_n.pro

Calculate the number of points in radius and longitude for a ring profile.

get_ring_profile_outline.pro

Generates an outline of a ring sector.

get_ring_profile_outline_oblique.pro

Generates an outline of an oblique ring sector.

get_ring_profile_outline_perp.pro

Generates an outline of a ring sector perpendicular to the image-projected radial direction.

get_solar_ref.pro

Produces inertial unit vectors corresponding to the projection of the sun direction into the given disk plane.

glb_image_bounds.pro

Determines globe coordinate ranges visible in an image described by a given camera descriptor.

illumination_fraction.pro

Assuming the body gbx is a sphere, this routine computes the fraction of its disk that appears illuminated by the source ltd, as seen from the inertial position vectors v.

image_ansa.pro

Computes ring ansa true anomalies.

image_ansa_far.pro

Computes ring ansa longitudes assuming observer is very far from the rings.

image_azimuth.pro

Computes azimuth angle of projection of inertial vector v into the image plane.

image_azimuth_pos.pro

Computes azimuth angle of projection of inertial position vector v into the image plane.

image_celestial_northangle.pro

Computes the image azimuth (see image_azimuth.pro) of celestial north.

image_interp_cam.pro

Extracts a region from an image using the desired interpolation, accouting for the camera point-spread function is applicable.

image_northangle.pro

Computes the image azimuth (see image_azimuth.pro) of the north direction on the surface of the given body at the specified pixel location p.

image_shift.pro

Shifts an image by a specified (non-integer) amount using interpolation.

impact_param.pro

Computes the impact parameter of a vector originating at the given camera, relative to the given planet object.

in_image.pro

Determines which input points lie within an image described by the given camera descriptor.

ltcorr.pro

Performs a light-travel-time correction on objects for which the correction has not already been performed.

map_units_disk.pro

Computes units for a map descriptor given pixel scales for the map center.

mask_globe.pro

Computes an image mask for a globe.

minmax_latlon.pro

Computes latitide/longitude ranges visible in a given camera.

phase_correction.pro

Assuming body gbx is a sphere, this routine computes the correction in pixels needed to obtain its true image center given a measurement of its center of light.

pixel_grid.pro

Generates grid lines aligned with the image window.

plot_inertial.pro

Plots inertial vectors on a camera image.

project_map.pro

Reprojects images.

radec_angle.pro

Computes angles between vectors specified in the radec system.

radec_image_bounds.pro

Determines radec coordinate ranges visible in an image described by a given camera descriptor.

radec_to_orient.pro

Computes orientation matrices such that the optic axis (axis 1) points in the direction of the given radec and the image y direction (axis 2) points toward celestial north (inertial [0,0,1]).

radec_twist_to_cd.pro

Computes a camera orietation matrix from thegiven Euler angles.

ray_points.pro

Computes points along rays.

ray_sub_point_graphic.pro

Iterates to find the point on the surface of the globe where the given ray is closest to the surface.

raytrace.pro

Traces rays from a camera to a set of objects.

render.pro

Performs rendering on an array of bodies.

reproject_image.pro

xx

ringplane_radial_bounds.pro

Finds ringplane radial bounds by projecting the camera FOV on the ringplane.

set_primary.pro

Sets the primary descriptor in the generic descriptor of the given object.

stellab.pro

Corrects body positions for stellar aberration on objects for which the correction has not already been performed..

stellab_pos.pro

Corrects positions for stellar aberration.

stellab_radec.pro

Corrects positions given in the radec system for stellar aberration.

stereo_split.pro

Splits a given camera descriptor into a stereo pair.

sub_latlon.pro

Computes sub-observer latitude and longitude on a globe.

surface_normal.pro

Computes the normal at points on a surface.

surface_to_degrees.pro

Converts angular part of surface vectors from radians to degrees

target_altaz.pro

Computes altitude/azimuth of a target relative to a point on or near the surface of a globe.
